dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: Can I take it with me?

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: Although, I have nowhere to put it anyway.

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: And this is the cupboard with sweets that Mom locks.

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: It's kind of sad to leave...

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: Maybe I should stay after all...?

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: And to be honest, the fairy doesn't really inspire confidence...

dialogue.name: Noah
dialogue.text: What if I break the lock and ruin my teeth? Maybe then the fairy will leave me alone...?
